header.title: Emathuluzi eSalatiso OHS
intro.title: Kuvikeleka Kwekwakha
intro.description: Cinisekisa kwekwetsemba kwemithetho yekuvikeleka kwekwakha ngetinsita teSalatiso OHS. Tinsita tetfu titfutfukisa kulawula ingoti, kulandzela umthetho, nekulondvolota basebenti esikhungweni, ngokusebentisa tindlela letitfutfukile letichazwe ku-*Safety First: The Essentials of OHS Plans*.
legal_obligations.client.title: Tibopho Temklayenti
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Umthetho Wekwakha 5(1)(a): Lungiselela Kuhlola Ingozi Yekucala (BRA) lechaza ingoti yephrojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Umthetho Wekwakha 5(1)(b): Nikeza Sichazelo Sekuvikeleka neMpilo lechaza tintfutfukiso letikhethekile tephrojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Umthetho Wekwakha 5(1)(l): Gcize Iphulani Lekuvikeleka neMpilo Yemkontraktha ngaphambi kwekutsi umsebenti ucale.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Tibopho Temkontraktha
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Umthetho Wekwakha 7(1)(a): Hlela Iphulani Lekuvikeleka neMpilo letelekelwe esichazelweni semklayenti.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Umthetho Wekwakha 7(1)(b): Gcina Ifayela Lekuvikeleka neMpilo esikhungweni naletinye tonkhe tingcwatfo letifunekako.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Umthetho Wekwakha 9: Hlela Kuhlola Ingozi Nekuhlola Ingozi (HIRAs) ngetindlela letikhethekile etinsakweni letikhethekile.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Tibopho Temsebenti We-H&S
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Umthetho Wekwakha 5(5): Ema-ejenti (PrCHSA) alawula i-H&S egameni lemklayenti, acinisekise kwekwetsemba.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Umthetho Wekwakha 8(5): Ema-ofisa (CHSO) asita emakontraktha ekusebentiseni nasekuhloleni emasistimu e-H&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Tinhlakanipho te-SACPCMP: Kumele agcine kwebhaliswe kantsi anetintfutfukiso te-CPD tindzima temsebenti wephrofeshini.
wizard.step_0: Sicele ukhetse sikhwama ukuze ucale inqubo.

wizard.step_1.label: Khetsa Tingcwatfo lotawutihlanganisa (Khetsa tonkhe letisebentako):
wizard.step_2.title: Sigaba 2 kwe-9: Imininingo Yemklayenti
wizard.step_3.title: Sigaba 3 kwe-9: Ingabe Mkontraktha Ubekiwe?
wizard.step_4.title: Sigaba 4 kwe-9: Imininingo Yemkontraktha
wizard.step_5.title: Sigaba 5 kwe-9: Imininingo Yephrojekthi
wizard.step_6.title: Sigaba 6 kwe-9: Buncani Bephrojekthi
wizard.step_7.title: Sigaba 7 kwe-9: Yihlanganiswe Ngu
wizard.step_8.title: Sigaba 8 kwe-9: Yihlanganiselwe
wizard.step_8.specify_error: Sicele uchaze kutsi tingcwatfo tihlanganiselwe bani.
wizard.step_9.title: Sigaba 9 kwe-9: Buyekeza Nekufaka Esikhwameni
wizard.step_9.description: Buyekeza lokukhetsile bese ufaka tingcwatfo esikhwameni sakho ukuze uqhubeke.
cart.title: Sikhwama Sakho
cart.invoice_reference: Inombolo Yerefarensi Ye-invoyisi: (Isebentela emalanga langu-7. Bhalisa ukuze ugcine kwekwe!)
resources.title: Tsintsana Nemafundzisi Labanekutivumelela be-H&S
resources.description: Udinga lusito lwemsebenti wephrofeshini? Tsintsana nemafundzisi labanekutivumelela ngetintfutfukiso tephrojekthi yakho.
resources.jane_doe: Jane Doe, I-Ejenti ye-SACPCMP (PrCHSA) - Inombolo Yekubhalisa: PR12345 - Kutsintsana: jane.doe@example.com
resources.john_smith: John Smith, Umphatsi we-SACPCMP (CHSO) - Inombolo Yekubhalisa: CHSO67890 - Kutsintsana: john.smith@example.com
footer.copyright: © 2025 Emathuluzi eSalatiso OHS. Onkhe Emalungelo Agodvwe.
footer.newsletter.title: Hlala Uhlaziyekile
chatbot.response: Ngilapha kute ngikutsintse! Uma ufuna tindzaba letinemininingo nge-OHS, sicele utjintje nemsebenti wephrofeshini.
sidebar.step_0.title: 📜 Kwekwetsemba kwe-OHS
sidebar.step_0.description: Cala ngokukhetsa umsebenti kute ucinisekise kwekwetsemba kwemithetho yempilo nekuphepha emsebentini.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ⚡ Indzaba Lencomekako: Ngabe uyati kutsi tingcwatfo te-OHS letifanele tinganciphisa tinsakulo emsebentini nge-30%? Asicaleni!
sidebar.step_1.title: 📋 Umthetho
sidebar.step_1.description: Umthetho wekwakha 5(1)(b) udzinga Sichazelo Sekuvikeleka neMpilo kuto tonkhe tiphrojekthi, kantsi 7(1)(b) idzinga Ifayela le-H&S.
sidebar.step_1.fun_fact: 🛡️ Indzaba Lencomekako: Sichazelo se-H&S lesicindzete singanciphisa ingoti nge-30%! Sinjengeludvonga lwekuphepha lwephrojekthi yakho.
sidebar.step_2.title: 📋 Umthetho
sidebar.step_2.description: Umthetho wekwakha 5: Emklayenti kumele anike Sichazelo Sekuvikeleka neMpilo futsi acinisekise kwekwetsemba kwemakontraktha.
sidebar.step_2.fun_fact: 💼 Indzaba Lencomekako: Emklayenti labagcina kwebhaliswe kwe-COIDA bangagwema kuhlawuliswa kakhulu—gcina leyo nombolo itsi eduze!
sidebar.step_3.title: 📜 Umthetho
sidebar.step_3.description: Umthetho wekwakha 7(1)(a): Emakontraktha kumele ahlele Iphulani Lekuvikeleka neMpilo letelekelwe esichazelweni semklayenti.
sidebar.step_3.fun_fact: 🤝 Indzaba Lencomekako: Kubeka mkontraktha ngalesikhatsi lesikapeleka kungasheshisa kwekwetsemba—umsebenti wesikhwama wenta kutsi liphupho lekuphepha lisebente!
sidebar.step_4.title: 📋 Umthetho
sidebar.step_4.description: Umthetho wekwakha 7(1)(b): Emakontraktha kumele agcine Ifayela Lekuvikeleka neMpilo esikhungweni naletinye tonkhe tingcwatfo letifunekako.
sidebar.step_4.fun_fact: 📞 Indzaba Lencomekako: Kutsi ube nemininingo yekutsintsana nemkontraktha lelungile kungagcina lusuku ngesikhatsi sekuvikeleka—hlala utsintsane!
sidebar.step_5.title: 📜 Umthetho
sidebar.step_5.description: Umthetho wekwakha 3(1): Imvumo iyafuneka etiphrojekthini letingaphezu kwe-R40,000 noma letitfola emalanga langaphezu kwe-180.
sidebar.step_5.fun_fact: 🚧 Indzaba Lencomekako: Tikheli tesikhungo leticacile tita umsebenti wekuvikeleka kutsi ukutfume ngalesikhatsi—ungavumeli iphutha lekubhala licandze lusito!
sidebar.step_6.title: 📋 Umthetho
sidebar.step_6.description: Umthetho wekwakha 9: Kuhlola Ingozi Nekuhlola Ingozi (HIRAs) ngetindlela letikhethekile kuyafuneka kuto tonkhe tinsakulo.
sidebar.step_6.fun_fact: 🔍 Indzaba Lencomekako: Kuchaza tinsakulo letiyingozi ngalesikhatsi lesikapeleka kunganciphisa ingoti nge-25%—kufana nekunika iphrojekthi yakho emandla ekuphepha!
sidebar.step_7.title: 📜 Umthetho
sidebar.step_7.description: Tinhlakanipho te-SACPCMP: CHSO kanye ne-PrCHSA kumele agcine kwebhaliswe kantsi anetintfutfukiso te-CPD tindzima temsebenti wephrofeshini.
sidebar.step_7.fun_fact: 🧑‍💼 Indzaba Lencomekako: Umsebenti wephrofeshini longakabhalisiwe we-SACPCMP anganciphisa kakhulu ingoti yemthetho—MVP yekuphepha yephrojekthi yakho!
sidebar.step_8.title: 📋 Umthetho
sidebar.step_8.description: Umthetho wekwakha 5(1)(l): Emklayenti kumele avume Iphulani le-H&S lemkontraktha ngaphambi kwekutsi umsebenti ucale.
sidebar.step_8.fun_fact: 📝 Indzaba Lencomekako: Kucaca kwekutsi ngubani lonesibopho etingcwatfeni kungakhulisa kucaca kweprojekthi—wonke umuntfu uyati indzima yakhe!
sidebar.step_9.title: 📜 Umthetho
sidebar.step_9.description: Umthetho Wempilo Nekuphepha Emsebentini: Tingcwatfo letifanele ticinisekisa kwekwetsemba futsi tivikele bonkhe lababandzakanyekako.
sidebar.step_9.fun_fact: 🛒 Indzaba Lencomekako: Sikhwama sakho simathuluzi akho ekuphepha—tingcwatfo tonkhe letifakiwe tenta kutsi iphrojekthi yakho iphephe kakhulu!
training.title: Kufundziswa Lokuphelele Kwesikhungo Semsebenti
training.description: Hlola tiphrojekthi tetfu tekufundziswa kwesikhungo semsebenti letiphelele kute ucinisekise kwekwetsemba kwemithetho ye-OHS yaseNingizimu Afrika futsi ukhuthate indzawo yemsebenti lephephile. Khetsa kufundziswa ngetandla, ngesigaba, noma usebentise sithusi setfu ukuze utfole tincomo letikhethekile letitekelwe embonini yakho, bantfu labakhetsiwe, kanye nendawo.
training.wizard.start: Sicele ukhetse sikhwama ukuze ucale inqubo yetincomo tekufundziswa.
training.wizard.step_1.title: Sigaba 1 kwe-5: Khetsa Imboni Yakho
training.wizard.step_1.label: Imboni:
training.wizard.step_2.title: Sigaba 2 kwe-5: Khetsa Bantfu Labakhetsiwe
training.wizard.step_2.label: Bantfu Labakhetsiwe (Khetsa tonkhe letisebentako):
training.wizard.step_2.option_emergency_: Lichikala Lekuvikeleka (Baniketayi Belusito Lwekuqala, Bacimi Bemlilo)
training.wizard.step_3.title: Sigaba 3 kwe-5: Chaza Indzawo Yakho
training.wizard.step_4.title: Sigaba 4 kwe-5: Tinhlaka Letinye
training.wizard.step_5.title: Sigaba 5 kwe-5: Buyekeza Kufundziswa Lokunconotwa
training.wizard.step_5.description: Ngokutekelwe kulokufakiwe, nangu emaphulani ekufundziswa lanconotwa. Khetsa lawo lofuna kuwafaka esikhwameni sakho.
training.cart.title: Sikhwama Sakho Sekufundziswa
training.cart.customization.title: Lungisa Emathuluzi Akho Ekufundziswa
training.cart.customization.first_aider_: Sicele ugcwalise ligama lemniketi welusito lwekuqala.
training.cart.customization.emergency_li: Sicele ugcwalise inombolo yefoni yetinhlekelele lesebentako (sib., +27123456789).
training.cart.compiled_by.title: Yihlanganiswe Ngu
training.cart.training_type.title: Indlela Yekunika Kufundziswa
training.cart.training_type.label: Khetsa Indlela Yekunika:
training.cart.checkout.disclaimer: Sichazelo se-SafetyHelp: Emathuluzi ekufundziswa laniketwa anetinsita letichazako kuphela futhi awaniketwa tincomo tephrofeshini. Kute utfole tincomo te-OHS letikhethekile, tsintsana ne-SafetyHelp ku-support@safetyhelp.co.za noma uhambele Likhadi Lekutsintsana.
training.checkout.success: Kukhokha kuhambekile! Emathuluzi akho ekufundziswa aphumile. Download-a ema-PDF akho ngezansi. Kufundziswa kwe-inthanethi, emakhodi ekungena atfunyelwe kuwe nge-imeyili.
training.providers.title: Baniketayi Bekufundziswa Labavunyelwe
training.providers.description: Udinga kufundziswa lomuntfu-muntfu? Tsintsana nebaniketayi bekufundziswa labavunyelwe ngetinsita takho.
training.providers.provider_1: ABC Training Solutions - Ivunyelwe yi-SETA - Ikhethekile Ekunikekeleni Lusito Lwekuqala, Kucisha Umlilo - Kutsintsana: info@abctraining.co.za
training.providers.provider_2: SafeSkills Academy - Ibhaliswe kwi-SACPCMP - Ikhethekile Ekuphepheni Kwekwakha - Kutsintsana: training@safeskills.co.za
training.manual.purchase.title: Tfola Bukana Yekufundziswa Lengasetjentiseka
training.manual.purchase.description: Tfola bukana yekufundziswa lephakeme lelungiswe yenkampani yakho, lehlanganisa tinsita temthetho, lokukanye lokukhethekile kwenkampani ngokutekelwe ku-phrofayili yengozi yakho, kanye netincomo tebaniketayi bekufundziswa labavunyelwe.
training.manual.risk_profile.title: Chaza Iphrofayili Yengozi Yakho Yebukana Yekufundziswa
training.manual.risk_profile.label: Iphrofayili Yengozi:
training.selection_method.title: Khetsa Indlela Yakho Yekufundziswa
training.legal_fact.step_1: Indzaba Yemthetho: Umthetho we-OHS Sigaba 8 udzinga kutsi baphatsi banikete kufundziswa lokulungiselelwe tingozi letikhethekile tendzawo yemsebenti.
training.fun_fact.step_2: Indzaba Lencomekako: Ngabe uyati kutsi kufundziswa lokuvamile kunganciphisa tinsakulo emsebentini nge-30%?
training.legal_fact.step_3: Indzaba Yemthetho: Ema-masipala angekhatsi angaba nemithetho ye-OHS leyehlukile lechaphatzela tindzaba tekufundziswa.
training.fun_fact.step_4: Indzaba Lencomekako: Tindzawo temsebenti letinengozi lephakeme njengemasikhungo ekwakha tidzinga kufundziswa lokuvamile kute tigcine tindlela tekuphepha.
training.legal_fact.step_5: Indzaba Yemthetho: Umthetho we-OHS uyala kufundziswa kwetindzima letikhethekile njengebammeleli be-SHE kute kucinisekiswe kwekwetsemba.
